title: Create Carousel Section
custom_preconds:
User is Logged into [ClubTools QA Space](https://qa-clubtools.us-central1.mobiletools-gcp-npd.mlbinfra.net)
User enters [Card Creator UI](https://qa-clubtools.us-central1.mobiletools-gcp-npd.mlbinfra.net/cardcreator)

custom_steps_separated.content:
When
On the Club Tools homepage, click on Card Creator
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then 
- User is taken to the Card Creator UI

custom_steps_separated.content:
When
Click on the Section Creator tab
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then
- The Section Creator tab is shown
- The "+ Add Section" Button is shown

custom_steps_separated.content:
When
Click on the "+ Add Section" Button
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then
- A New Section appears in the sidebar
- The New Section is automatically selected
- The Section Details page is displayed with: 
    - No default Title
    - Text and Background color have default values
    - Section Layout has some default value selected
    - Name has a default value equal to the default name of the Section

custom_steps_separated.content:
When
Add a new value to the Title field
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then
- The default section title displayed on the sidebar has updated to the new Title value

custom_steps_separated.content:
When
Select the "Horizontal" option for Section Layout
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then
- The UI updates to show the Horizontal option is selected
- In the sidebar, the section has been updated showing blank, carousel-style cards

custom_steps_separated.content:
When
Click on Push to Beta
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then
- The Push to Beta button should no longer be clickable
- The Publish to Production button should be clickable

custom_steps_separated.content:
When
Click on Publish to Production
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then
- The Publish to Production button should no longer be clickable

custom_steps_separated.content:
When
Refresh the Card Creator page
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then
- The newly created section should still be present
- The Title field should be equal to the non-default value

title: Create Horizontal (Carousel) Card Group
custom_preconds:
User must be logged into Club Tools, be in the Card Creator UI, and must have created a Section for testing purposes 
- If one does not exist: Complete [C30768803] to create a new section
custom_steps:
Optional Test Image [https://storage.mobileqa.mlbinfra.com/assets/MLB/cardcreator/MLB-Story-Card.png]
Optional Test URL [ballpark://webview?url=https%3A%2F%2Fmlbqa.tickets.com%2Fschedule%2F%3Fagency%3DMLB_MPV%26orgid%3D48617%23%2Fsales_group_code%3BsalesGroupId%3D2320]

Card Color #ffffff
Card Background #6699ff

custom_steps_separated.content:
When
Click on the 'Card Creator' tab located next to the 'Section Creator' tab
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then
- User is navigated to a different UI which shows the cards for all sections

custom_steps_separated.content:
When
Click on the '+ Add Card' button
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then
- A drop down menu listing all sections should appear
- The horizontal Test Section being used should have 'Story V1 Card', and only 'Story V1 Card' listed underneath it

custom_steps_separated.content:
When
Click on 'Story V1 Card' under the Test Section's heading
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then
- A New Story Card Group should be created in the Test Section
    - Its name should be 'New Card Group' or similar to indicate its newness
- User should be automatically navigated to that new Card Group in the UI
- A new Card should be automatically displayed within that Card Group, with a default title, i.e. '(Change Me)'

custom_steps_separated.content:
When
Click on the menu on the 'Change Me' card tab
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then
- A drop down menu should appear
- The option 'Rename' should be present

custom_steps_separated.content:
When
Click on 'Rename'
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then
- A text box should appear to allow renaming the section

custom_steps_separated.content:
When
Enter a unique name for the card and click on the checkmark button
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then
- The Card should display the updated name

custom_steps_separated.content:
When
Add a valid image, i.e. the image actually exists, to the Image field
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then
- The chosen image displays on the card shown in the lefthand column

custom_steps_separated.content:
When
Enter a URL in the URL field
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then
- The URL is displayed in the text box on the righthand section

custom_steps_separated.content:
When
View the Card Text Color and Card Background Color text boxes
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then
- There are default values filled in
- The correct color for those values is displayed in the small box at the end of the text box

custom_steps_separated.content:
When
Enter any arbitrary values into the Reporting fields
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then
- The values are displayed in the text box

custom_steps_separated.content:
When
Click the 'Push to Beta' button
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then
- A pop up confirming you want to push to Beta appears

custom_steps_separated.content:
When
Click Yes
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then
- A message appears indicating that your changes have been saved
- The Publish to Production button becomes clickable

custom_steps_separated.content:
When
Click Publish to Production
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then
- The button should no longer be clickable
- Your changes should all be visible on the Ballpark App homepage

title: Duplicate Card Group

title: Hide Card Group
custom_preconds:
Confirm user has created a Test Card Group(s) -- If one does not exist - Complete [C30768802]
    --> Confirm that this Group is currently shown in the App

Confirm a Hidden Section exists -- If one does not exist - Complete

custom_steps_separated.content:
When
Select a card group to hide
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then
- There should be a selectable menu button next to the Card Group's name

When
Click the selectable menu button from the above step

Then
- A drop down menu should appear
- A selection named 'Assign to Section' should be present

custom_steps_separated.content:
When
Click on 'Assign to Section'
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then
- A list of all Sections should appear
- There should be two section headings: 'Sections' and 'Hidden Sections'

When
Click a the Hidden Section to add the card group to

title: Inbox Feature Flagging  [iOS < 11.7.0, ANDROID >= 10.1.0]
custom_preconds:
GIVEN User has Ballpark app installed and is logged in

UPDATED TEST NOTES - 10/17/2022:
*enable_inbox is no longer used for iOS 11.7.0 [BP-9783](https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BP-9783)
*More tab showing Profile/Inbox icon was removed with [BPA-6398](https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BPA-6398) / [BP-9676](https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/BP-9676)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN Inbox Feature is turned off (i.e. enable_inbox is disabled in Remote Config)
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN User will not have the ability to view Inbox (i.e. There will be no icon shown on Home/More Tab)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN Inbox Feature is turned on (i.e. enable_inbox is enabled in Remote Config)
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN User will have the ability to view Inbox (i.e. There will be an icon shown on Home/More Tab)

title: Inbox Message List
custom_preconds:
GIVEN  Inbox feature is enabled* 
AND User has Ballpark app installed 
AND User is logged in


*Inbox Feature Flagging available for iOS < 11.7.0 
*Inbox Feature Flagging available for ANDROID >= 10.1.0

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user clicks on Inbox Icon in HomePage/MyProfile 
AND user has no messages
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the Inbox empty screen will be presented

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user clicks on Inbox Icon in HomePage/MyProfile 
AND user has messages
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN list of messages will be presented

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN list of messages is presented
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN each message will be in the list
AND each entry in the list will have a subject, sender & body preview and a date received

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN list of messages is presented with at least one unread message

(if needing a new unread message, it can be sent to account via Club Tools - Notifications Manager
https://qa-clubtools.us-central1.mobiletools-gcp-npd.mlbinfra.net/notifications )
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN each unread entry in the list will have the Sender and subject text bold

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN list of messages is presented with at least one read message
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN each previously read entry in the list will have the Sender and subject text NOT bold

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks on a message in the list
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN a screen with details of that message will be presented

title: Inbox Message Details
custom_preconds:
GIVEN Inbox feature is enabled*
AND User has Ballpark app installed
AND User is logged in
AND user has at least one message in the list of messages

*Inbox Feature Flagging available for iOS < 11.7.0
*Inbox Feature Flagging available for ANDROID >= 10.1.0

https://qa-clubtools.us-central1.mobiletools-gcp-npd.mlbinfra.net/notifications )

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the screen of message details is presented which has no icon url nor action url
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN screen will be presented which contains the message's sender, subject, and message.  The message icon will be the placeholder / default value (gray mlb logo).  There will be no action button shown.

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the screen of message details is presented which has an icon url
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN screen will be presented and message icon will be the value specified (i.e. "https://storage.mobile.mlbinfra.com/bplogos/2020/115@3x.png")

custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN a button will be displayed labeled with action text and when clicked will navigate to the destination of the action url (i.e.           "ballpark://wallet", "http://www.google.com", etc.)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the screen of message details is presented and user returns to Message list
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the status of the message will be read

title: At the ballpark during the game
custom_preconds:
https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/CLUBTOOLS-1486

As a fan attending an event who loves My History & free stuff from offers, I want the current game added to my history and all the offers unlocked when I’m in the ballpark

GIVEN The user is logged in and satisfies all conditions needed to allow a Check-in to occur

Note to complete a check-in User must:
* have location permissions (precise) enabled for Ballpark App on the device
* have device located at the venue (can be mocked)
* have a home game scheduled at the team venue within 3 hrs of device time AND also prior to after 6 hrs of game time (can be mocked)

NOTE: Auto Check-in feature is ticket agnostic, meaning that expected behavior should be verified both with AND without tickets
custom_steps: WHEN the user open the app to Home Page
custom_expected: THEN the user should be automatically checked-in

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user open the app to Home Page
AND the user does NOT have tickets for the event intended to check-in
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is shown an indicator that user has been automatically checked-in to the event

** typically something like 'Go to My History' context card, 'Unlocked Offer' context card, etc.

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user proceeds to My History page 

** typically via home page button, deeplink, or manually tapping through My Profile
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is shown the event listed in the user's history as latest entry with capability to Add/Edit the event (such as Add New Photos, Edit seat/note details)

custom_steps_separated.content: (note: if using the same account to verify with and without tickets, ensure that the event check-in has been removed/deleted, prior to proceeding)

WHEN the user open the app to Home Page
AND the user has tickets for the event intended to check-in
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is shown an indicator that user has been automatically checked-in to the event

** typically something like 'Go to My History' context card, 'Unlocked Offer' context card, etc.

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user proceeds to My History page

title: Error state (Network ON, HomeService Unavailable)
custom_preconds:

AND the home service is unavailable
custom_steps: WHEN user is on the home tab
custom_expected:
THEN user is shown a Context Card with a message explaining to me the situation and a link to see tickets
* subject: Sorry
* body: We’re having a little trouble personalizing your Home tab right now. You can always see your tickets and team schedules over on the Tickets tab.
* CTA: “Go to Tickets” deeplink to ballpark://wallet

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user has network connection 
AND the home service is currently unavailable **
AND the user does not have cache data for today
AND user is on the home tab



** To simulate Home Service unavailable - use Charles and had breakpoint to request 
* bphometab.mobile.mlbinfra.com - Staging
* bphometab.mobileqa.mlbinfra.com - QA

* onboard a newly created account OR
* prior to login of an existing acct, delete firestore doc and log in to acct for newly installed BP app

THEN user will be shown 'Sorry' Context Card
AND user is able to see tickets via 'Go to Tickets' button

custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the title/subject of the card is displayed as 'Sorry'
AND the body of the card is displayed as 'We’re having a little trouble personalizing your Home tab right now. You can always see your tickets and team schedules over on the Tickets tab'
AND 'Go to Tickets' button is shown

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user taps 'Go to Tickets' button
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is taken to Tickets tabs (via deeplink of ballpark://wallet)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user returns back to Home tab
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user will be shown 'Sorry' Context Card

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN home service is restored
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is shown updated Home tab
